name: Blofin
intro: Most focused and secure crypto trading platform
introduce: Blofin is a data-driven crypto asset management institution aiming to provide customers with safe, convenient, and professional crypto financial services. On January 12, 2023, Blofin launched Blofin.com, a new trading platform with futures trading capabilities that will provide practical features and protocols for practitioners, professionals, and executives. The platform uses the Merck tree proof to ensure the safety of assets and has obtained the corresponding fund safety certificate.
